title: There might just be life on Mars
description: So the Mars Rovers didn't scoop up any alien lifeforms. Scientist Penelope Boston thinks there's a good chance -- a 25 to 50 percent chance, in fact -- that life might exist on Mars, deep inside the planet's caves. She details how we should look and why.
author: Penelope Boston
keywords: TED, talks, Planets, exploration, extraterrestrial life, geology, life, science, technology, universe, Mars, solar system
